articles.description: Fans eager for the return of Ford's full-size Bronco SUV will have to wait a little longer.

articles.title: COVID-19: Indonesia gets first batch of vaccines from China's Sinovac - CNA
articles.description: Indonesia has received its first batch of COVID-19 vaccines from China. A mass inoculation programme will be carried out in stages. Frontline workers could g...
